mapper.select: select * from company_info order by ci_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into company_info (ci_name, ci_address, ci_phone, ci_email, ci_status) values(#{ci_name}, #{ci_address}, #{ci_phone}, #{ci_email}, #{ci_status})
mapper.update: update company_info set ci_name=#{ci_name}, ci_phone=#{ci_phone}, ci_email=#{ci_email}, ci_status=#{ci_status}, ci_address=#{ci_address} where ci_seq=#{ci_seq}
mapper.select: select ci_seq from company_info order by ci_seq desc limit 1
select ci_seq, ci_name, ci_status from company_info where ci_name like #{keyword}
